mapper.insert: insert into document_tb (doc_id, doc_writer, doc_title, doc_content, doc_type, doc_date) values (#{id}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{creationDate})
mapper.select: select doc_id id, doc_writer writer, doc_title title, doc_content content, doc_type type, doc_date creationDate from document_tb WHERE doc_id=#{id}
select doc_id id, doc_writer writer, doc_title title, doc_content content, doc_type type, doc_date creationDate from document_tb WHERE doc_writer=#{writer}
